title: Small Lizard

properties.name: description
properties.value: Small Lizards are Slayer monsters found north-north- east of Nardah east of fairy ring (DLQ). An Ice cooler must be used on a lizard when it has 1-4 hitpoints left in order to kill it. They can be killed for Desert Lizard slayer tasks.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Small Lizard
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Small Lizards are Slayer monsters found north-north- east of Nardah east of fairy ring (DLQ). An Ice cooler must be used on a lizard when it has 1-4 hitpoints left in order to kill it. They can be killed for Desert Lizard slayer tasks.

  • 2 Drops
